name: Query the Registry for Anita Francesca Marina
description: The EHR allows the provider to select the patients that will be seen in the clinic for the day. Generates a Z44 query to the Immunization Registry to retrieve the patients to be seen in the clinic for the day. Anita Francesca Marina is among these patients, and her vaccine history and recommend vaccinations will be retrieved from the registry for review and reconciliation in the EHR to inform the provider’s vaccination decisions
